changes.description: Converted the posts' `sent_hugs` column from a string column to an array column. This ensures we don't need to manually split the array when pulling data from the database and to join the array back into a string when pushing data to the database.
Fixed a bug where the `sent_hugs` array returned by the back-end was a list of strings, instead of a list of integers (due to us having to manually split the string saved in the database).
